snippet: A line of Rollerblade inline skates is being recalled because the boot can separate from the skate frame during use. Other recalled consumer products include garage door openers and heated gloves that both pose fire hazards....

headline.print_headline: Recalls This Week: Inline Skates, Heated Gloves
headline.main: Recalls This Week: Inline Skates, Heated Gloves

lead_paragraph: A line of Rollerblade inline skates is being recalled because the boot can separate from the skate frame during use. Other recalled consumer products include garage door openers and heated gloves that both pose fire hazards.
